newsitem.title: GERMANY: Jagoda sees average 4.3 mln German jobless in 1997.
newsitem.headline: Jagoda sees average 4.3 mln German jobless in 1997.

text.p: German Federal Labour Office president Bernhard Jagoda said that staying within the 4.3 million average jobless corridor was still a possibility in 1997.
"If the September figures do not show an improvement, I will have to reexamine my forecast," he told a news conference after releasing jobless figures for July.
Jagoda added that reducing average unemployment in 1998 to around "four million" is possible.
